inventoryprofiles.config.description.inv:
This is not meant to disable the overlay buttons!
This is meant so you can assign a shortcut to temporary hide/show the overlay buttons!
To permanently enable/disable overlay buttons use the other options on this page.
inventoryprofiles.config.description.sho: When set to true there will be two sets of sort buttons one of the player inventory and one for the opened chest.
inventoryprofiles.config.name.show_fast_: 显示批量重命名复选框
inventoryprofiles.config.description.sho:
在铁砧UI中显示批量重命名复选框
这在需要批量重命名多组物品以用作过滤器时非常有用。
inventoryprofiles.config.description.fas: 此设置控制在关闭界面后，复选框状态是否会被保留，或者始终重置为下面配置的默认值
“批量重命名” 复选框的已保存/默认状态
inventoryprofiles.config.name.auto_refil: Also Show Icons in the Hotbar
inventoryprofiles.config.description.all: Show low durability notifications even when early tool replacement is disabled
inventoryprofiles.config.description.sta: 触发自动重装的堆叠数量
inventoryprofiles.config.description.aut: Allows you to enable/disable Auto Refill per slot.

When enabled a small icon will be show on top left of every slot that
has Auto Refill enabled.
Enables the small icon from above option to be shown in the hotbar too.
inventoryprofiles.config.description.dir:
开启时，鼠标滚轮向上会将物品从玩家物品栏移动到箱子，滚轮向下则会将物品从箱子移动到玩家物品栏

关闭时，鼠标滚轮向上会将光标所在物品栏的物品移动到另一物品栏，滚轮向下会将另一物品栏的物品移动到光标所在物品栏
inventoryprofiles.config.description.tem: 按住此按键时，禁用物品滚轮移动功能
inventoryprofiles.config.name.auto_refil: Toggle Auto Refill for Slot Under the Cursor
Toggle Auto Refill for the Active Hotbar Slot
inventoryprofiles.config.description.glo: 将鼠标指针所在的交易添加为全局交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.loc: 将鼠标指针所在的交易添加为本地交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.do_: 执行所有已添加的全局交易书签对应的交易
执行所有已添加的本地交易书签对应的交易
inventoryprofiles.config.name.global_boo: 添加第2组全局交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.name.local_book: 添加第2组本地交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.glo: 将鼠标指针所在的交易添加为第2组全局交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.loc: 将鼠标指针所在的交易添加为第2组本地交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.do_: 执行第2组中所有已添加的全局交易书签对应的交易
执行第2组中所有已添加的本地交易书签对应的交易
inventoryprofiles.config.name.global_boo: 添加第3组全局交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.name.local_book: 添加第3组本地交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.glo: 将鼠标指针所在的交易添加为第3组全局交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.loc: 将鼠标指针所在的交易添加为第3组本地交易书签
inventoryprofiles.config.description.do_: 执行第3组中所有已添加的全局交易书签对应的交易
执行第3组中所有已添加的本地交易书签对应的交易
inventoryprofiles.config.description.aut:
Press this shortcut to toggle Auto Refill for the slot under the cursor.
You can also move the mouse while holding it to toggle multiple slots.
Only Hotbar and gear slots are supported.

You can use this shortcut to toggle Auto Refill for the currently active Hotbar slot.
This will work only if no GUI is opened.
inventoryprofiles.tooltip.sort_button.ke:
§6 - Use scroll wheel over this button
§6to change the sort order.
